name: Lenovo - Install Commercial Vantage
description: This will install Lenovo Commerical Vantage while in the Full OS

options.name: LCVWarrantyInfoHide
options.description: This will Hide the "Warranty Info" page in Lenovo Commercial Vantage

options.name: LCVGiveFeedbackPageHide
options.description: This will Hide the "Give Feedback" page in Lenovo Commercial Vantage

options.name: LCVMyDevicePageHide
options.description: This will Hide the "My Device" page in Lenovo Commercial Vantage

options.name: LCVWiFiSecurityPageHide
options.description: This will Hide the "WiFi Security" page in Lenovo Commercial Vantage

options.name: LCVHardwareScanPageHide
options.description: This will Hide the "Hardware Scan" page in Lenovo Commercial Vantage

options.name: LCVTurnOffMicrophoneSettings
options.description: When this policy is enabled, the Microphone Settings features of Commercial Vantage will be turned off
